cards.title: Large Outlook cache files detected, so oversized OST caches can slow Outlook performance.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Large Outlook cache files detected, so oversized OST caches can slow Outlook performance.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Large Outlook cache files detected, so oversized OST caches can slow Outlook performance.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Generic misconfiguration
steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.
